sentences.en: I was born cherubic and chubby.
sentences.cn: 我出生时胖乎乎的，像天使般可爱。

sentences.en: The affable Keefe a friendly smile cherubic countenance , a checked sports jacket and gabardine slacks.
sentences.cn: 基夫圆脸庞,笑容可掬, 穿着格子纹的运动衫和华达呢便裤.

words.tran_cn: 小天使；胖娃娃；天真美丽的儿童

trans.tran_cn: 天使的，天真无邪的，可爱的
trans.tran_en: If someone looks cherubic, they look sweet and innocent like a cherub
